name: Bankruptcy Countdown
description:
Bankruptcy Countdown, a game for Ludum Dare, April 2020.

Currently only windows build and a somewhat buggy mac build, but we are working on improving the builds for more platforms. 

Now also in web version!

The economic situation of our factory has recently been bad. You have to work efficiently to make money for the factory to keep it alive!

Controls: - W,A,S,D for movement
- J plus A or S moves fork up/down
- K for sprint, but too much sprint slows you down!
- L releases parcel

Pick up parcels from the band, and drop with L key at truck with same symbol as the parcel. You will get money when the truck leaves loading dock!

Don't forget to turn audio on :)
